title: 3D Voxel Plot of the NumPy Logo
description: This lab demonstrates how to use the Axes3D.voxels function in Matplotlib to create a 3D voxel plot of the NumPy logo.

meta.title: Visualize the NumPy Logo in 3D Voxel Plot
meta.description: Learn how to create a 3D voxel plot of the NumPy logo using Matplotlib and Python.
meta.keywords: numpy logo, matplotlib, 3d voxel plot, python, data visualization
